lps.pr1
Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  lps.pr1.Parser

public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

The parser is in charge of parsing the user input in order to generate a command for the application.
Up to now, the valid commands are:

  • HELP
  • LOOK
  • GO { NORTH | SOUTH | EAST | WEST }
  • QUIT

    • See Also:
    Command, Scanner

    Nested Class Summary
    static class Parser.Direction
              It represents the compass directions: North, east, south and west.

              Commands recognized by the application (help, go, look and quit)

    Method Detail

    nextCommand

    public Command nextCommand()
    Parse the next command in the input stream. It returns a command if the input is parsed correctly

    Returns:
    A configured command if we have found a correct command. Otherwise, it returns null.

    getHelp

    public java.lang.String getHelp()
    It returns information about all the commands that the application understands

    Returns:
    A string with the information about all the available commands
